interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: KINGDOMCARES New Year Gifts Electric Mask Heater Essence Facial Mask Pure Natural Face Mask for Facial Treatment Reduce Wrinkles Acne Scars Blackheads Cellulite Ultimate Spa Quality Skin Care Golden
Review Date: 2016/05/25
Store: KINGDOM CARES
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KINGDOM CARES', 'Product Benefits': 'Soften', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.7 x 5 x 2.1 inches; 13.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '719970775442'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:efd2e36bf2bab8b7032dbcb10aeeafa]] [[VIDEOID:b9e3c43df8c763984c125f015c45b005]] This product is wonderful,easy to use,safe and convenient.Plus I never knew this product existed until I was searching for facial masks and this came up,The Mask Heater.I did a little bit of research about warming up facial masks and the pros and cons of it.Their are no cons,the masks actually work better at a warm temperature and you do not have to worry about the mask getting to hot.I had to buy this for all of my facial masks.I am so amazed at the difference this mask heater makes my facial masks work so much better!It is something you really will love if you are a face mask person and I know that face mask's are all the rage now.The Electric mask heater is small and portable,which I love!It measures about 6 1/2 inches long and a little over 4 inches wide and is very thin,under a inch.It is so easy to use,I personally unfold my mask halfway,Lay it on the smooth part of the heater,solid part,close the cover,do not worry about the mirror,it wipes off easily, anything that gets on it,let it sit for four minutes in the heater and the mask is then suitable to put on your face.You will feel such a nice warm feeling on your face,it is addicting.The temperature that it reaches with this heater is actually the best for all the nutrients to absorb so much better into your skin. The heater heats the mask up to 45 degree's and that is the best temperature to accelerate blood flow,smooth pores,just leaves your skin so healthy looking and very hydrated!Unplug it after the four minutes and wipe your heater off including the mirror and it is ready for your next warming facial mask experience.I am a big fan of skin care and this product is going to be on everyone's wish list for the Holidays!My best friend tried it and she is already told her husband that she wants one for Christmas,Her Birthday or their Anniversary,she didn't care which one!This is really a nice way to pamper your skin and yourself and every woman deserves that!Kingdom Care has a warranty on this mask heater for two years,so they believe in the quality of their products.The workmanship is outstanding and they use the finest materials available.They include a very step by step instruction manual to guide you through the usage and taking care of your machine.Plus they include a wonderful Thank you card and if you send them a email they will give you a promo code on another one of their products,I think that is so sweet.Plus you get your warranty card.The company really cares about their customers which is very refreshing.I am so thrilled with my Electric Mask Heater and I know you will be to!!Thank you for my discount for my honest opinion.
Review Title: A Must Have For All Facial Mask Lovers, Improves The Nutrients In Your Masks,Leaves Your Skin Healthy & Hydrated!Happy Customer!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
RegenFX Skincare Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Green Tea Extracts and Hyaluronic Acid. Potent Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle Treatment, Skin Tightening, and Collagen Stimulation. Net Wt 1.0 oz/ 30 ml
RegenFX Skincare
["Reset the clock and recover your skin's youth with this nourishing, sculpting, and firming cream that is infused with an energetic blend of essential oils. Formulated with RegenFX complex, this anti aging cream helps restore skins natural younger form, addressing and reversing sagging skin and loss of volume, elasticity, density and wrinkles. This all-in-one highly active energetic anti aging moisturizer focuses on cellular regeneration, lifting and wrinkles with the latest targeted peptide complexes. A joyous and energetic blend of proprietary ingredients that creates a therapeutic aromatherapy effect."]
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 7 inches; 1.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FXMOIS-1', 'UPC': '641061984320', 'Manufacturer': 'Eureka Brands LLC'}
This feels so good on your skin.It goes on in a cream form and in seconds soaks right into your face and neck.I am already telling a difference in my skin tone and fine lines.The cream comes in a pump bottle which I really like.The cream has a very light fragrance,very light.My favorite part is the intense collegen regeneration which is something every woman's skin needs.Especially the over fifty group.Thank you for letting me review this at a lower cost.
Loving This Moisturizer
Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum with Vitamin C for Face - Organic Anti Aging & Anti-Wrinkle Skin Treatment - Penetrates Deeply & Activates Collagen Production for a Younger, Firmer & Brighter Complexion
Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies

This is definitely a treat for your skin.It comes in a pump dispenser which I love.It comes out in a clear form.It goes on wonderfully and soaks into tourism in a matter of minutes.It is not oily or greasy.Very faint fragrance.It contains the best three anti aging ingredients,hyaluronic acid,Vitamn C and Green tea.By having all three of these ingredients you have a powerful formula for anti aging.After applying this serum let dry and use a moisturizer before putting on your make up.Thank you so much for letting me review this at a lower cost.

I love everything about these eyelash curlers.The packaging is beautiful.This is one of the best beauty tools that I have used.The eyelash Curler is made very durable and high quality.They work so well it really made my eyes stand out.I am so pleaded with everything.This would be a perfect gift for the woman who has it all.Thank you for letting me review these At a lower price.

krieger + söhne

What a wonderful treat for my husband.It has a minty smell which stimulates your scalp and makes your head and hair feel fantastic.A wonderful way to wake up in the shower.This would be a wonderful present for someone special in your life.Very luxurious shampoo and conditioner for men.The smell is wonderful.We are very excited about this product.Thank you so much for letting us review this at a lower price.
Gotta Have!
The Best Natural, Organic Anti Aging Face Serum ,this Beauty Product is an intense moisturizer for dry and sensitive skin, helps reduce appearance the of wrinkles for a smooth radiant glow
The Natural Boost CompanyATOPAL
{'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168230170', 'Manufacturer': 'The Natural Boost CompanyATOPAL'}
The Natural Boost company has a Moisture Boost Serum that is fantastic.It feels like cold water going on,I would love to sink in a bathtub of this serum,it actually feels that good on your skin.It comes in a pump dispenser so the gel comes out nicely.You only apply a little bit just a drop to forehead,chin and cheeks and massage it in.Let absorb completely and apply your make up.I have been using it for a pick me up during the day.It does not leave your skin oily or greasy.Skin feels hydrated and toned.Thank you for a discount for my honest opinion.
Best Facial Hydration Serum
Lula Lilly Shower Cap for Small and Petite Woman, Brilliant Butterfly
Lula Lilly (Beauty For Smart Women)
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 6 x 2 inches; 0.35 Ounces'}
This is absolutely perfect for me.It fits very well and I have medium long hair and all my hair fits in it.The shower cap is not uncomfortable to wear.Snug but that is how I want it.I have dry hair so it is nice to take a bath or shower and your hair is not damp.The butterfly material is kind of like a silk material while the cap inside is a very nice durable plastic.The workmanship is very good.I have used it about three times since I got it and I have a suction cup in the shower which I hang it up to dry.The shape stays the same,I believe I will get a ton of use out of this shower cap.I love that it is so pretty.The most wonderful thing about this cap for me is I have had two different surgeries on my stomach and I have to use medicine and soak at least three times a week and hotel shower caps would not keep my hair free of getting this powerful medicine on it,this one has worked absolutely wonderful.My hair is dry when I come of of one of my prescription soaks.Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion.
Works Great For Showers or Baths,Made Very Well,Plus It Is So Pretty!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Focus:** Strong interest in anti-aging products that enhance collagen regeneration and improve overall skin tone and texture.
- **Ingredient Preference:** Favors formulations rich in vitamin C, vitamin E, and hyaluronic acid, with an increasing interest in green tea and tea tree oil for added benefits.
- **Texture Preference:** Enjoys non-greasy creams and serums, particularly gel formulations that absorb quickly and provide refreshing hydration.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Prefers very light fragrances but shows openness to subtle minty scents from natural sources like tea tree and peppermint.
- **Grooming Interest:** Engaged with beauty tools for eye makeup routines and has expanded interest to personal care products, including grooming items for hair. Recently purchased a high-quality shower cap that enhances bath/shower experiences.
- **New Interest:** Recently embraced tools that enhance skincare routines, such as a device to warm facial masks, which has improved the efficacy and enjoyment of mask applications, contributing to a more luxurious self-care experience.
- **Target Demographic:** Identifies with the 50+ age group, focusing on effective solutions for aging skin and hair concerns.
- **Product Analysis:** Values user-friendly packaging and therapeutic benefits, particularly those offering aromatherapy features and cooling sensations.
- **Satisfaction Level:** Experiences high satisfaction with products that deliver noticeable improvements, emphasizing hydration and overall skin health.

The user consistently seeks effective, comfortable skincare and grooming solutions while exploring complementary beauty products, highlighting a keen appreciation for quality and functionality.
